backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles plus admin‑only CRUD for pictures and messages with access‑control and blob‑storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented gameplay and UI changes with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files covering layout, game, hooks, editors, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme variables and dark mode variants defining the site's OKLCH color system and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component wiring sections, authentication, profile setup, owner tools, and theme provider.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with query cache clearing and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for creating the owner profile with name input, validation, and save mutation.
frontend/src/components/game/MatchPairsM: A memory matching mini‑game that shuffles cards, tracks flips and matches, counts moves, and triggers onWin when all pairs are matched.
frontend/src/components/game/RewardsModa: A modal displaying three reward images and offering options to close or play the game again.
frontend/src/components/game/WinPopups.t: Generates temporary celebratory pop‑up images at random positions when activated, then clears them after an animation.
frontend/src/components/owner/ImageUploa: Dialog for adding or editing pictures with validation, preview support, and upload progress tied to backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/owner/MessagesEd: Interface to add, edit, delete, and reorder text messages with backend sync and inline editing UI.
frontend/src/components/owner/OwnerEdito: Admin‑only panel that opens a sheet containing tabs for managing pictures and messages.
frontend/src/components/owner/PicturesEd: Interface to add, delete, edit, reorder, and preview pictures, integrating with picture management hooks.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Sectio: Renders a fixed navigation bar with buttons that scroll smoothly to Valentine sections and highlights the active section.
frontend/src/components/valentine/sectio: Implements a match‑pairs minigame with win handling, rewards, replay logic, and progress persistence.
Displays the Valentine intro hero section with headline, description, and a button that scrolls to the photos section.
Fetches and displays ordered user messages with loading skeletons and empty‑state handling.
Fetches and displays images in a responsive grid with hover effects and a dialog for viewing details.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Valent: Provides the main Valentine page layout with gradient styling, section navigation, content wrapper, and footer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Exposes hooks for checking admin status and retrieving the caller’s user profile using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameProgress.ts: Tracks whether the user has won the game using sessionStorage with functions to mark or reset progress.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling login, logout, identity loading, and status management.
frontend/src/hooks/useMessages.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating messages via the actor, with cache invalidation and toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/usePictures.ts: React Query hooks for CRUD and reordering of pictures using actor calls, including cache refresh and toasts.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styling and custom Valentine-themed color variables, utilities, and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entrypoint that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/utils/imageValidation.ts: Validates uploaded images by type and size, allowing only JPG/PNG up to 5MB.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for retrieving, persisting, and clearing URL/session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, animations, and layout settings with plugins enabled.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, versions, and the overall Valentine-themed IC app architecture.
